resources.string:
"This is an unofficial app created by @Bostrot. It is still a beta build which means features may not work are unstable or result into a crash.

" + "Features:
PiP (Android 8.0)
Notifications (not yet)
Fullscreen video play
Default D.Tube app
And more!

Report bugs in the play store, on Reddit or on GitHub (Link in Reddit Post)."
